caption.p: Additional file 3 : Movie S3. Huh-7 cells were transfected with plasmids encoding NP, L, VP35, VP24, VP40, GP, Marburg virus specific minigenome, T7 polymerase, and VP30-GFP. The cells were treated at 15 h p.t. with 0.15 μM nocodazole for 3 h. Time-lapse images of cells were recorded for 90 s; images were captured every 2 s.
